title: Cerebrate
description:
Cerebrate is an agentic AI model designed to communicate intelligently with internal systems.
Upon receiving user inputs from a web app, Cerebrate processes the raw data. Usually, it specifically inspects uploaded images or videos to understand the context before taking action.
It acts as a bridge by contacting the relevant backend microsystems and returning the correct system responses.
Simultaneously, it replies to the user while writing every event to a persistent log for auditing.

[BUTTON:View an Example Use|]

title: Nydus
description:
Nydus is a specialized tool designed for continuous deployment of projects to a Debian 11 server.
For every git push or git pull, the tool updates the relevant systems and applications while also doing compatability checks and rollback capabilities.
The goal of this tool is to ensure reliability and redundancy for every systems deployed remotely.
